Text: Intelligent design movement:  The overall goal of the intelligent design movement is to overthrow materialism and atheism.

Text: Intelligent design movement:  Its proponents believe that society has suffered "devastating" cultural consequences from adopting materialism and that science is the cause of the decay into materialism because it seeks only natural explanations, and is therefore atheistic.
